Ghost

A general purpose programming language

Learn more →

Simple

Ghost skips shortening terminology. With clean and verbose syntax, it's a joy to read and write.

General Purpose

Ghost aims to be a truly general purpose programming language by covering many domains.

Fast

Ghost's goal compiler is to be written in C to ensure that it's fast and performant for any task.
